scripts.cypress:e2e: wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost:3000 cypress run --env configFile=e2e
scripts.cypress:e2e:ci: wait-on http://consumer-ui:8080 && cross-env CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://consumer-ui:8080 cypress run --env configFile=e2e
scripts.cypress:e2e:dev: yarn generate && cross-env CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost:30000/ concurrently "wait-on http://localhost:30000 && npx cypress run --env configFile=e2e" --kill-others "npx http-server -p 30000 ./dist" --success first
scripts.cypress:integration: wait-on http://localhost:6006 && cross-env CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost:6006 cypress run --env configFile=integration
scripts.cypress:integration:ci: wait-on http://consumer-storybook:8080 && cross-env CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://consumer-storybook:8080 cypress run --env configFile=integration
scripts.cypress:integration:dev: cross-env CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost:60000 concurrently "wait-on http://localhost:60000 && npx cypress run --env configFile=integration" --kill-others "yarn storybook -p 60000" --success first
scripts.test: echo "See package.json => scripts for available tests." && exit 0
